import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SubTaskListService } from 'src/services/sub-task-list-service/sub-task-list.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-subtask', templateUrl: './subtask.component.html', styleUrls: ['./subtask.component.css'] }) export class SubtaskComponent { selectedAll: any; selectAll() { } constructor(public sub_task_list_service: SubTaskListService) {}; }
